extendedInfo.description: Financial Chronicle (FC), from the Hyderabad-based Deccan Chronicle Holdings Ltd was launched on 16th  April, 2008, by Indiaâs youngest team of media professionals, and in the shortest-ever run-up for a newspaper. Financial Chronicle (FC) is the flagship of a proposed multi-brand platform in the business journalism space from Deccan Chronicle Holdings Ltd, focusing on the various sectors of Indian economy. It is positioned to aid high net worth individuals in taking investment decisions.The multiple platforms of FC have been crafted to target specific audience communities to deliver information on sectors based on their economic weightage and investment flows since opening up of the Indian economy in 1991.Financial Chronicle also launched its website www.mydigitalfc.com , in the same year, designed as Indiaâs first business networking platform.Financial Chronicleâs Android App provides you an opportunity to avail the newspaperâs complete insight and also continuously updated articles. This app brings the news paper and its content one step closer to the users enabling them to personalize and share their favorite news articles and read it from anywhere for free.FEATURESâ¢	All content available for free.â¢	Top News: Latest Financial news as and when they occur from all over the world.â¢	My Money: Mutual Funds, Insurance, Banking and Real Estate news.â¢	My Stocks: News from Stock Market, derivatives and Commodities segments.â¢	My Brands: Brands, Companies, Products, Advertising and Consumer related news.â¢	My World: Governance, Policies, Economy and Politics newsâ¢	My Space: Careers, Opportunities, Enterprises, Knowledge and Technology updates.â¢	My Mind: Editorial, Op-Ed, Columnsâ¢	FC Supplements: FC Invest, FC Know, FC Build and FC Roar. â¢	FC Weekend: Special pullout from Print edition on every Saturday.â¢	Share: Users can share their favorite stories and pictures through mail, facebook and twitter.â¢	Comment: Users can post comments for any and every story.â¢	Breaking news: Get Breaking news and other alerts from Financial Chronicle via push notification.â¢	Incorporated in News Stand App.â¢	Simple and easy navigation.
